org.mortbay.ijetty.webapp
类 AndroidClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      org.mortbay.ijetty.webapp.AndroidClassLoader

public class AndroidClassLoader
extends ClassLoader

AndroidClassLoader Loads classes dynamically from dex files wrapped inside a zip.

addClassPath

public void addClassPath(String classPath)
                  throws IOException
Accept a pre-made classpath. NOTE: the path elements must be separated by ":" chars, not ";"

抛出：
IOException
